Job Title: Sr. Analyst, Digital Analytics, LAC

Location: Miami, FL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
About Restaurant Brands International

Restaurant Brands International Inc. is one of the world's largest quick service restaurant companies with over $40 billion in annual system-wide sales and over 30,000 restaurants in more than 100 countries. RBI owns four of the world's most prominent and iconic quick service restaurant brands – TIM HORTONS®, BURGER KING®, POPEYES®, and FIREHOUSE SUBS®. These independently operated brands have been serving their respective guests, franchisees and communities for decades. Through its Restaurant Brands for Good framework, RBI is improving sustainable outcomes related to its food, the planet, and people and communities.

Job Overview

RBI LAC brands (Burger King, Popeyes, Tim Hortons and Firehouse Subs) are in the middle of an exciting digital transformation. Within this fast-emerging digital, data rich environment, our Digital team is increasingly focused on creating insights to drive our digital strategy forward. We’re focused on innovation across the customer journey in and outside our restaurants, identifying the most meaningful opportunities for our guests, and developing capabilities to bring them to life.

We strongly believe that we’ll advance our brands by deepening our understanding of our guests and their relationship with our restaurant and brand level KPIs. By creating insight from the multitudes of data we receive, we’re able to better meet the needs of our guests while growing sales, brand perception, and franchisee profit.

Within the LAC Digital team, the Sr. Analyst, Digital Analytics is responsible for generating the insights that form the building blocks of our Digital Sales strategy, working closely with the rest of the team across all digital channels (website, mobile app, kiosk, 3rd party delivery, outdoor menu boards, etc.) to drive in-store visits and digital sales. You will lead sales routines and create reports and analyses that generate valuable insights for the continuous growth and improvement of our digital efforts. You will also work closely to our partner Franchisees in deploying the recommendations and helping the digital business grow.

You are a hard-working, proactive individual, with excellent analytical skills who manages well and efficiently large databases.

Roles And Responsibilities

Work with the IT teams and franchisees to ensure consistent visibility on LAC digital business metrics and accuracy of data.Lead digital sales routines by consolidating LAC countries’ digital sales and reporting on LAC digital sales KPIs to evaluate business performance.Develop monthly and annual digital sales forecasts based on different business strategies.Provide appropriate parties, including senior leadership, with timely, accurate, insightful analyses on digital sales & digital marketing programs (growth strategies, marketing campaigns, customer lifecycle activations).Create and optimize dashboards using multiple data sources (e.g., traffic analyses, conversion funnels, customer lifecycle) and regularly report on insights derived from these tools to internal and external audiences.Work in partnership with franchisees to leverage digital drivers and grow digital sales to maximize business results.Design tests, measure impact and learn through a results-driven mindset with cross-functional teams.Measure ROI of different initiatives to inform future opportunities.Partner with Consumer Tech & IT teams to ensure that appropriate emerging technology is planned for and applied to achieve customer experience and business objectives.

Required Skills

BA/BS degree in Business, Math, Engineering, Statistics, or a related fieldA strong interest in the digital spaceStrong organization skills and attention to detail to deal with large sets of dataStrong analytical skills to draw insights from large sets of data, including excellent Excel skillsData-driven mindset with a passion for understanding customers and results. An ideal candidate can clearly identify a problem, analyze it, develop hypothesis, and propose solutionsStart-up mentality, eager to move quickly and work with a lean team, dealing with ambiguities and comfortably handling uncertaintiesHighly curious, always looking to learn and stay ahead of trendsWorking knowledge in Marketing Technology (MarTech ecosystem - CDP, Web Analytics, Data Visualization) is a plusTechnical knowledge to bridge the gap between business side and Engineering/IT side is a plus

Restaurant Brands International and all of its affiliated companies (collectively, RBI) are equal opportunity and affirmative action employers that do not discriminate on the basis of race, national origin, religion, age, color, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability, or veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by local, state, provincial or federal laws, rules, or regulations. RBI's policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment. Accommodation is available for applicants with disabilities upon request.
